channel.title: PI bow help
channel.description:
when i wield my zaryte bow and attempt to attack something it says "you are out of arrows" (thats good), but when i put any type of arrow with it it says you cant use it, how do i make it so you can fire up to dragon arrows out of it?
if anyone could help i would be very very happy :)

item.title: PI bow help
item.dc:creator: @hawkgames hawkgames
item.description:
@hawkgames wrote:

[code]public int correctBowAndArrows() {
if (usingBolts())
return -1;
switch(c.playerEquipment[c.playerWeapon]) {
case 15241: // hand cannon with shot
return 11212;
case 843:
case 845:
case 839:
case 841:
return 884;

		case 847:
		case 849:
		return 886;
		
		case 851:
		case 853:
		return 888;        
		
		case 855:
		case 857:
		return 890;
		
		case 859:
		case 861:
		case 16337:
		return 892;
		
		case 4734:
		case 4935:
		case 4936:
		case 4937:
		return 4740;
		
		case 11235:
		case 15701: // dark bow	
	case 15702: // dark bow	
	case 15703: // dark bow	
	case 15704: // dark bow	
                    case 14481:
                    case 14482:
		return 11212;
	}
	return -1;
}[/code]

case 15702: // is dark bow id
return 11212 // is dragon arrow id

Figure it out.

Read full topic
